title: Griffins' Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic shop with a mostly vegetarian bistro/cafe that clearly marks vegan items. Staff is knowledgeable about what is vegan. Has daily changing soup and lunches as well as a salad and snack bar and a counter with cake and desserts including vegan choices such as flap jacks and crumble, apple cake and others. Has an upstairs seating area.
